name: Silver Blue
description:
Silver blue is a Boy Love visual novel game rating 15+ that containing mystery adventure fantasy content about Cyan's journey to find his missing master. The remaining clues lead him to a mysterious mountain, which seemingly related to his origin, and at the same time his forgotten memories start to come back.

Game features:

♦Three love interests and their respective routes, with 10 different endings overall depends on your choices.

♦Around 200k words in content.

♦More than 40+ in-game Illustrations.

♦30+ original backgrounds.

♦20 original soundtracks.

♦4 different title screen to unlock.
